name: github-commit-prefixes
title: GitHub Commit Prefixes
description: A handy tool for exploring and understanding GitHub commit prefixes based on the Conventional Commits specification. Perfect for developers looking to streamline their commit messages.
author: jordan_roberts

commands.name: index
commands.title: Show Prefixes
commands.description: Browse commonly used commit prefixes and their meanings based on Conventional Commits.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
